sense.def:
To sanction an action or practice
pomeni, da oseba, ki ima ustrezno moč in položaj, nekaj uradno odobri in dovoli, da se izvede.

seg.quote: ...the law of 1856 which sanctioned the remarriage of widows.
Some months later our proposal was given official sanction.

sense.def:
A sanction
so strogi ukrepi, ki naj bi ljudi pripravili do tega, da bi spoštovali zakone.

seg.quote: The ultimate sanction of the government is the withdrawal of funds.

sense.def:
Sanctions
so ukrepi, s katerimi vlada ene države omeji trgovanje in uradne stike z drugo državo, ki je prekršila mednarodno pravo.

seg.quote: The UN would impose economic sanctions against the offending nation.
